00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 #include <stdlib.h>
00023 #include <time.h>
00024 #include "logfile.h"
00025 
00033 char *asctime(const struct tm *timeptr)
00034 {
00035         static char wday_name[7][3] = {
00036                 "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"
00037         };
00038 
00039         static char mon_name[12][3] = {
00040                 "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun",
00041                 "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"
00042         };
00043 
00044         static char result[26];
00045 
00046         sprintf(result, "%.2d/%.3s/%3d:%.2d:%.2d:%.2d",
00047                 timeptr->tm_mday,
00048                 mon_name[timeptr->tm_mon],
00049                 1900 + timeptr->tm_year,
00050                 timeptr->tm_hour,
00051                 timeptr->tm_min, timeptr->tm_sec);
00052 
00053         return result;
00054 }
00055 
00056 int write_logentry(char *msg,
00057                    char *component,
00058                    int flag)
00059 {
00060         FILE *fd;
00061         char entry_msg[MAX_ENTRY_LENGTH];
00062         int choice = flag;
00063 
00064         time_t now = time(NULL);
00065         char *current_time = asctime(localtime(&now));
00066 
00067         if ( NULL == (fd = fopen(LOGFILE, "a")) ) {
00068                 return -1;
00069         }
00070 
00071         switch (choice) {
00072         case UNKNOWN: sprintf(entry_msg, "UNKNOWN\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00073                 break;
00074         case ERR_FLAG: sprintf(entry_msg, "ERROR\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00075                 break;
00076         case WARN_FLAG: sprintf(entry_msg, "WARNING\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00077                 break;
00078         case INFO_FLAG: sprintf(entry_msg, "INFO\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00079                 break;
00080         default: sprintf(entry_msg, "UNKNOWN\t[%s] %15s - %s\n", current_time, component, msg);
00081         }
00082 
00083         fprintf(fd, "%s", entry_msg);
00084 
00085         fclose(fd);
00086 
00087 }
